markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Mapping the Archipelago: Port Maje | conc = | next = Mapping the Archipelago: West Wakara Reef | internalname = 03_QST_Cartographer_Two | guid = f19fb82a-567a-4de6-acb4-3695850ed4e0 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Sanza](/sanza/), the excitable cartographer in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. He asks the Watcher to do it. ## Walkthrough * This quest is a little harder - well, a lot harder - as it requires you to chart three islands: [The Black Isles](/theBlackIsles/)' central island, the one with the [subterranean temple](/subterraneanTemple/), and the [forgotten catacomb](/forgottenCatacomb/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Two.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: Tikawara''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. I've made some progress, but there's still a lot to explore. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands around Tikawara.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza, the cartographer in Queen's Berth, asked me to make a survey of the uncharted islands of the Deadfire Archipelago. This time, he pointed me toward the islands surrounding the Huana village of Tikawara. He makes claim of three islands forming a rough approximation of a triangle around Tikawara. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Upon a swampy island just southeast of Neketaka, I found a crypt infested with hostile vessels. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | South of Tikawara, I discovered a strange ruin dedicated to Wael, god of secrets. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | East of Tikawara, I found an Engwithan ruin, dedicated to the goddess Woedica. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have finished surveying the region around Tikawara, and can return to Sanza at his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka for my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I gave Sanza my information on the islands around Tikawara, and claimed my reward. |}

I've made some progress, but there's still a lot to explore. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands around Tikawara.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza, the cartographer in Queen's Berth, asked me to make a survey of the uncharted islands of the Deadfire Archipelago. title: Mapping the Archipelago: Tikawara
